title: conferred on him by section 36 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Precautionary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Precautionary 
Confinement of Birds) Regulations 2020 (Revocation) Regulations 2021 and 
come into operation on 9 April 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited avian influenza (precautionary confinement birds) regulation 2020 (revocation) regulation 2021 come operation 9 april 2021

title: conferred on him by section 36 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013
heading: 2. The Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement of Birds) Regulations
text_raw:
2. The Avian Influenza (Precautionary Confinement of Birds) Regulations 

2020 are revoked. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 

7 April, 2021. 

MARTIN BLAKE 

 An officer authorised to authenticate the Seal of the Minister 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [164] 3
text_norm: 2 avian influenza (precautionary confinement birds) regulation 2020 revoked given official seal minister agriculture food marine 7 april 2021 martin blake officer authorised authenticate seal minister notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 9th april 2021 164 3

title: conferred on him by section 36 of the Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The effect of these Regulations is to revoke the Avian Influenza (Precautionary 
Confinement of Birds) Regulations 2020 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [164]
